data.expected_result: It should open the game activity to show what friends are playing the selected game
data.short_description: It's no longer possible to click on game titles/pictures in the user popup to bring up the new game activity window
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a game that has a splash icon (I only know of Rust, Minecraft, Heroes of the storm and Overwatch) - Attempt clicking on the name/picture
